name: Skull of Savages
flavorText: Often giving advice to others, the neighborly elder barbarian has an unusual habit of hiding his face.
flavorTextHtml: Often giving advice to others, the neighborly elder barbarian has an unusual habit of hiding his face.
setDescription:
(2) Set:     
 Double the effectiveness of shouts. You deal double damage to Feared, Frozen, or Stunned enemies.(4) Set:     
 Each Frenzy stack reduces damage taken by 6%. Frenzy lasts twice as long.(6) Set:     
 Frenzy deals 1000% increased damage per stack.
setDescriptionHtml:
(2) Set:
Double the effectiveness of shouts. You deal double damage to Feared, Frozen, or Stunned enemies.
(4) Set:
Each Frenzy stack reduces damage taken by 6%. Frenzy lasts twice as long.
(6) Set:
Frenzy deals 1000% increased damage per stack.
